data.eml:eml: The genus Cultroribula (Acari: Oribatida: Astegistidae) in Mongolia, with new findings from Altai Mountains and remarks on known species of the world

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bayartogtokh, Badamdorj (2012): The genus Cultroribula (Acari: Oribatida: Astegistidae) in Mongolia, with new findings from Altai Mountains and remarks on known species of the world. Zootaxa 3302: 44-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.212417
